mapper.select: SELECT a.artist_id, ar.name AS artist_name, tg.name AS mood_name, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM artist_mood_vote a JOIN tag tg ON a.mood = tg.id JOIN artist ar ON a.artist_id = ar.id GROUP BY a.artist_id, ar.name, tg.name ORDER BY a.artist_id, vote_count DESC
SELECT id, user_id, artist_id, mood FROM artist_mood_vote ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, user_id, artist_id, mood FROM artist_mood_vote WHERE artist_id = #{artistId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM artist_mood_vote WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND artist_id = #{artistId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist_mood_vote (user_id, artist_id, mood) VALUES (#{userId}, #{artistId}, #{mood})
